title: Downloading history with no progress
body:
Hi all,
Application has completed all the stages, but now it's not increasing the latest block. When I send `get_block` rpc value it doesn't change and shows `18273232`. Below you can see the portion of the logs. Besides these logs, there is not much going on. I tried restarting the node several times but it always stuck with these logs. Any idea about it?
```
INFO[10-05|12:56:46.800] P2P                                      app=caplin peers=30
INFO[10-05|12:56:47.000] Downloading History                      app=caplin stage=DownloadHistoricalBlocks progress=7471328 blk/sec=0.0 peers=30
INFO[10-05|12:57:12.681] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth68=14 eth67=23
INFO[10-05|12:57:13.607] [txpool] stat                            pending=9402 baseFee=24539 queued=30000 alloc=4.7GB sys=8.7GB
INFO[10-05|12:57:17.000] Downloading History                      app=caplin stage=DownloadHistoricalBlocks progress=7471328 blk/sec=0.0 peers=32
INFO[10-05|12:57:46.800] P2P                                      app=caplin peers=32
INFO[10-05|12:57:46.999] Downloading History                      app=caplin stage=DownloadHistoricalBlocks progress=7471328 blk/sec=0.0 peers=32
INFO[10-05|12:58:13.597] [txpool] stat                            pending=9469 baseFee=24601 queued=30000 alloc=4.2GB sys=8.7GB
INFO[10-05|12:58:17.000] Downloading History                      app=caplin stage=DownloadHistoricalBlocks progress=7471328 blk/sec=0.0 peers=32
INFO[10-05|12:58:46.800] P2P                                      app=caplin peers=27
INFO[10-05|12:58:46.999] Downloading History                      app=caplin stage=DownloadHistoricalBlocks progress=7471328 blk/sec=0.0 peers=27
INFO[10-05|12:59:12.681] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth68=15 eth67=23
INFO[10-05|12:59:13.606] [txpool] stat                            pending=9499 baseFee=24698 queued=30000 alloc=4.6GB sys=8.7GB
INFO[10-05|12:59:17.000] Downloading History                      app=caplin stage=DownloadHistoricalBlocks progress=7471328 blk/sec=0.0 peers=32
INFO[10-05|12:59:46.799] P2P                                      app=caplin peers=30
INFO[10-05|12:59:47.000] Downloading History                      app=caplin stage=DownloadHistoricalBlocks progress=7471328 blk/sec=0.0 peers=30
INFO[10-05|13:00:13.597] [txpool] stat                            pending=9682 baseFee=24806 queued=30000 alloc=4.3GB sys=8.7GB
INFO[10-05|13:00:17.000] Downloading History                      app=caplin stage=DownloadHistoricalBlocks progress=7471328 blk/sec=0.0 peers=26
INFO[10-05|13:00:46.799] P2P                                      app=caplin peers=30
INFO[10-05|13:00:47.000] Downloading History                      app=caplin stage=DownloadHistoricalBlocks progress=7471328 blk/sec=0.0 peers=30
INFO[10-05|13:01:12.681] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth68=15 eth67=23
INFO[10-05|13:01:13.605] [txpool] stat                            pending=9730 baseFee=24913 queued=30000 alloc=4.7GB sys=8.7GB
INFO[10-05|13:01:17.000] Downloading History                      app=caplin stage=DownloadHistoricalBlocks progress=7471328 blk/sec=0.0 peers=28
INFO[10-05|13:01:46.799] P2P                                      app=caplin peers=26
INFO[10-05|13:01:47.000] Downloading History                      app=caplin stage=DownloadHistoricalBlocks progress=7471328 blk/sec=0.0 peers=26
INFO[10-05|13:02:13.598] [txpool] stat                            pending=9799 baseFee=24966 queued=30000 alloc=4.3GB sys=8.7GB
INFO[10-05|13:02:17.000] Downloading History                      app=caplin stage=DownloadHistoricalBlocks progress=7471328 blk/sec=0.0 peers=28

```

Here's the YAML config while executing erigon:
```
datadir : "/opt/ether-data"
port : 1111
chain : "mainnet"
http : true
private.api.addr : "localhost:9090"

http.api : ["eth","debug","net"]
torrent.download.rate : "3mb"
downloader.disable.ipv6 : true
batchSize : "512mb"
etl.bufferSize : "512mb"
internalcl : true

```
